Name: Lentils (PH)
Description: These are high in protein and even the same plant will produce multiple colors.

DescriptionLocalization.es: These are high in protein and even the same plant will produce multiple colors.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: These are high in protein and even the same plant will produce multiple colors.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Sie haben einen hohen Proteingehalt und sogar dieselbe Pflanze kann mehrfarbige Linsen tragen.

DescriptionLocalization.ja: These are high in protein and even the same plant will produce multiple colors.
DescriptionLocalization.pt: These are high in protein and even the same plant will produce multiple colors.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Бобы чечевицы полны белка. Интересный факт: одно и то же растение может давать несколько окрасок бобов.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: These are high in protein and even the same plant will produce multiple colors.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 它们富含蛋白质，即使是同一株植物也会产生多种颜色的果实。
